translation.en: I don't have time to worry about how it happened.
We're genetically engineered to stop aging at 25.
translation.zh: 基因改造让人类年龄停在25岁

translation.en: The trouble is, we live only one more year
translation.zh: 问题是我们只能活到26岁

translation.en: unless we can get more time.
We earn it and spend it.
translation.zh: 赚的是时间 花的也是时间

translation.en: I just want to wake up with more time on my hand than hours in the day.
translation.zh: 真希望早晨醒来时发现自己活着的时间可以超过一天

translation.en: You got in late last night. I put in some overtime.

translation.zh: 那些时间呢？ 给你买了礼物

translation.en: They drink it in New Greenwich. Happy 50th!
translation.zh: 新格林威治人都喝酒庆祝 50岁生日快乐

translation.en: Oh, I was sure I'd have a grandchild by now.
translation.zh: 我以为我这年纪会有孙子了
我以为我这年纪会有孙子了 -又来了-贝拉女儿老问起你

translation.en: Bela's daughter is always asking about you.
Who has time for a girlfriend? Besides, what's the hurry?
translation.zh: 谁有时间交女友？急什么？

translation.en: We owe half that in rent.
Eight for the electric and we're still late on that loan.
translation.zh: 八小时要缴电费 贷款也迟缴了

translation.en: I can make extra on the side, you know.
Remember, I'm not here tonight. I got two days' work in the garment district.
translation.zh: 记得 我要去时装区上班两天

translation.en: I know. Meet me at the bus stop tomorrow.
After I pay off the loan, I won't have long. I'll be there.
translation.zh: -缴完贷款我就没时间了-我会到

translation.en: Will... I just wouldn't know what to do if I lost you.
translation.zh: 威尔真不知道没有你怎么办

translation.en: Let me give you 30 minutes so you can have a decent lunch.
translation.zh: 给你30分钟好好买顿午餐

translation.en: When you get back, we're going to celebrate.
What are you talking about, Mya? You have a whole year.
translation.zh: 米雅 你还有一整年

translation.en: Not a year I can use yet.
translation.zh: 我的时间给冻结了 不能花

translation.en: Come on, Will. I've got bills to pay.
translation.zh: 威尔 我有一堆帐单要付

translation.en: Four minutes for a cup of coffee?
translation.zh: （咖啡：四分钟） -咖啡要四分钟一杯？-昨天才三分钟
-咖啡要四分钟一杯？-昨天才三分钟

translation.en: You want coffee or you want to reminisce?
translation.zh: 你是买咖啡还是追忆往事？

translation.en: How many shifts you got today, Borel? Just the two.
If you had any of your father in you, we could make a fortune.
translation.zh: 要是你像你老爸 我们就赚翻了
又一个 还是大白天呢

translation.en: Whoa, what is this? Where's the rest?
translation.zh: 慢着 其他该付我的时间呢？

translation.en: My units are up from last week.
translation.zh: 你没达到工作定额 我干得比上周多

translation.en: So's the quota. Next. That's a joke, right?
translation.zh: 工作定额也提高了 下一个 你不是开玩笑吧？

translation.en: Next. MAN: Move it. You're taking forever.
translation.zh: -下一个-快走吧 别拖拖拉拉

translation.en: I don't have time to gamble anymore.
translation.zh: 赌不赌 威尔？ 我没时间可以赌

translation.en: Because ever since you stopped playing, I started winning.
You still owe me an hour.
This madman's been buying drinks all night. He's got a century!
translation.zh: 这疯子整晚请个不停 他有一世纪的时间

translation.en: Come on, let me get you home.
Soon as I finish this drink.
Do you want to come home with me?
You can take us both home.
You need to get out of here.
I mean, they aren't going to rob you. They are going to kill you.
translation.zh: 不光是抢 他们会杀了你

translation.en: They can't take that much time and let you live to tell about it.
translation.zh: 抢这么多时间不能放你活口

translation.en: I don't think you understand. You should not be here!
translation.zh: 你没听懂 你不该来这里！

translation.en: He's asking for it. Let's go. He's not one of us.
translation.zh: 他自找的 我们走 他不是同路人

translation.en: Don't worry. I won't do anything stupid.
translation.zh: 放心 我不会做蠢事

translation.en: And that, sir, is a very nice watch.
Do you mind if I try it on? I think it would suit me.
translation.zh: 可以借我试戴吗？很适合我

translation.en: I'm an old man. Turned 75 last week.
translation.zh: 我是老头 上周都满75了

translation.en: Let's get you out of here.
Stop. What are you doing? I can take care of myself.
translation.zh: 你做什么？我会照顾自己

translation.en: I know what I'm doing. Run. Run!
Where the hell are you going? Get in here!
What the hell are you doing here?

translation.zh: 在这里可以安全躲到早上

translation.en: I'll get you out of here.
Looks like you could use some help yourself.
You won't see 106, you have too many more nights like tonight.
translation.zh: 再像今晚一样 你活不到106岁

translation.en: But the day comes when you've had enough.
translation.zh: 你总有一天会活到不耐烦

translation.en: Your mind can be spent, even if your body's not.
translation.zh: 心理疲惫不堪 虽然肉体依然健康

translation.en: That's your problem? You've been alive too long?
translation.zh: 这就是你的问题？活太久？

translation.en: You ever known anyone who's died?
translation.zh: 你没有承受过失去亲人的痛苦？

translation.en: For a few to be immortal, many must die.
translation.zh: 少数人要永生 就得牺牲多数人

translation.en: What the hell is that supposed to mean?
You really don't know, do you?
Everyone can't live forever. Where would we put them?
translation.zh: 大家都不死 我们该把人放哪儿去？

translation.en: Why do you think there are Time Zones?
translation.zh: 否则何必用时间区分贫富？

translation.en: Why do you think taxes and prices go up
the same day in the ghetto?
The cost of living keeps rising to make sure people keep dying.
translation.zh: 提高生活费是为了确保死亡率

translation.en: How else could there be men with a million years
while most live day to day?
But the truth is there's more than enough.
No one has to die before their time.
If you had as much time as I have on that clock,
translation.zh: 如果你的时间和我一样多

translation.en: what would you do with it?
I can tell you one thing.
If I had all that time,
I sure as hell wouldn't waste it.
Don't worry. I won't take it in the night.
translation.zh: 放心 我不会半夜偷你时间

translation.en: A shame we gotta wait 25 years.
translation.zh: 可惜25年后才能用 我们现在就很缺时间

translation.en: We could use that year right now.
You'd better get her inside, Greta.
They were going to kill him.
He timed himself out before I could stop him.
He didn't just give me this. He gave me the truth about it.
translation.zh: 他不只是送我 还向我解释真相

translation.en: You can't let anyone see that.
You know that time will get you killed.
How long have we been friends?
Where this won't look out of place.
translation.zh: 去一个不会格格不入的地方

translation.en: I finally got the time to take my mom to New Greenwich.
translation.zh: 终于可以带我妈去新格林威治了

translation.en: COMPUTER VOICE: Loan payment received, two days. Thank you.
translation.zh: 缴交贷款 两天 谢谢

translation.en: Now it's two. Price went up.
translation.zh: 现在是两小时 涨价了

translation.en: My son is meeting me. He'll pay the difference.
translation.zh: 儿子会来接我 差额由他补

translation.en: I have an hour and a half.
The last time anyone saw him alive, there was over a century on that clock.
translation.zh: 证人说他本来有一百多年

translation.en: Around here, they'd kill you for a week.
translation.zh: 这里的人连一周都会抢

translation.en: What was he doing in this Time Zone?
was he might have brought this on himself.
Interesting. How long you been keeping time, Jaeger?
translation.zh: 有意思 你看管时间多久了？

translation.en: Let me know what you think when you have been doing it for 50.
It doesn't matter why he came here.
translation.zh: 他为什么到这里来不重要

translation.en: What matters are the hundred years that came with him.
translation.zh: 他为什么到这里来不重要 重要的是那一百年的下落

translation.en: Trust me, no one saw anything.
translation.zh: 相信我 绝对没人看到

translation.en: What would you like us to do, sir?
What we always do. Follow the time.
translation.zh: 一样 追踪时间办案

translation.en: Hey, Ray. I'll give you 10 minutes for an hour.
translation.zh: 老雷 一次算你一小时就好

translation.en: When are you gonna get out of the game, Leila? You gotta be pushing 60.
translation.zh: 蕾拉 你还不退休？都快60了

translation.en: Am I in the right place?
We don't normally make pickups in this Zone.
translation.zh: 我们通常不来这个时区接人

translation.en: COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one month.
There are more of these than I remember.
translation.zh: 我不记得有这么多收费站 （第4区边界）

translation.en: What are you really doing here?
I'm going to take them for everything they've got.
I'm going to make them pay.
Please, miss. You can't be too careful.
translation.zh: 小姐 小心行得万年船

translation.en: Two months for a standard room.
Do you need help with your bags?
He's fast. He's going to have to be.
The camera doesn't show us how the body got into the river.
translation.zh: 摄影机没拍到他怎么落河

translation.en: We know that most thefts in Dayton amount to hours or days.
translation.zh: 达顿区的抢案最多只抢几天

translation.en: I don't see any more in circulation.
translation.zh: 我没看到多出来的时间

translation.en: He could have capsuled the time.
You can't hide a hundred years in the ghetto.
They can sense when a man has a month more than he should.
That'll be eight and a half weeks.
You're not from around here, are you?
You do everything a little too fast.
What's that place across the street?
If you turn back the clocks the day of Hamilton's death,
and look at the time checks,
translation.zh: 汉弥顿身故当天 有人大手笔从达顿跨越时区

translation.en: someone spent years crossing four different Time Zones from Dayton--
translation.zh: 有人大手笔从达顿跨越时区

translation.en: To New Greenwich. The cameras picked up on his suspicious behavior.
translation.zh: 来到新格林威治 摄影机拍到可疑行径

translation.en: he doesn't have a bodyguard, and he runs.
translation.zh: 他没有保镖 走路还小跑步

translation.en: But if he has time, he doesn't need to run.
translation.zh: 有时间的人不需要跑步

translation.en: It's a hard habit to break.
I assume my time is as good as anyone's.
translation.zh: 我的时间和其他人一样够用

translation.en: Indeed it is. However, there is a voluntary donation
translation.zh: 当然 但是非会员要捐献

translation.en: for non-members. Most give a year.
I don't believe we've had the pleasure of your company before, Mr...
translation.zh: 以前没见过阁下 敢问大名？

translation.en: Philippe Weis. You must come from time.
translation.zh: 菲利浦魏斯 府上一定是世家

translation.en: You could say I'm gambling my inheritance.
You don't have a guard, Mr. Salas?
translation.zh: 你没保镖 萨拉斯先生？

translation.en: I assumed I was amongst friends.
When you've been 25 for 85 years, like I have,
knowing only a random act of violence can take your life,
translation.zh: 知道只有出意外才会死

translation.en: you learn to appreciate what you have.
And you seem to have a lot to appreciate.
Of course, some think what we have is unfair.
translation.zh: 当然有人认为长生不死不公平
是有人说过 这不就是演化的逻辑？

translation.en: But isn't this just the next logical step in our evolution?
And hasn't evolution always been unfair?
It's always been survival of the fittest.

translation.zh: 不过是达尔文资本主义

translation.en: And I think your hand is weak.
It appears you're all in, Mr. Salas.
translation.zh: 显然你拿全部身家来赌

translation.en: No offense. I knew I was going to win.
translation.zh: 失礼了 但是我非常有把握

translation.en: Is she my mother, my sister or my daughter?
translation.zh: 她是家母 姐妹还是小女？

translation.en: You're hoping she's not my wife.
Things used to be simpler once. So I'm told.
translation.zh: 听说以前没有这个问题

translation.en: Though she does look a lot like my wife. Sylvia?
translation.zh: 她长得很像内人 席薇亚？
这是威尔萨拉斯 恭喜 萨拉斯先生

translation.en: You've taken years off my father's life.
translation.zh: 你害我父亲少活几百年

translation.en: Which is normally what you do. Isn't that right, my darling?
translation.zh: 通常你才有这能耐 是不是 宝贝？

translation.en: We're having a party tomorrow night.
Perhaps you'll give him a chance to win back some of those years.
Carl will tell you where I am. Good night, Mr. Salas.
translation.zh: 卡尔会告诉你我家地址 晚安

translation.en: To wherever you're going to display it.
Hell, I'm going to drive it.
Allow me to introduce my mother-in-law, Clara,
translation.zh: 我帮你介绍我的岳母克莱拉

translation.en: my wife, Michele, and my daughter, Sylvia.
translation.zh: 内人蜜雪儿 小女席薇亚

translation.en: I believe you two have already met.
PHILIPPE: I'll come find you later

translation.zh: 逛得开心吗 萨拉斯先生？

translation.en: Do you always have a hired hand standing right next to you?
translation.zh: 你身边一直有个保镖跟着吗？

translation.en: That doesn't make it very easy to get to know you.
I think that's the idea. Your idea?
translation.zh: 就是这样才好 你的主意？

translation.en: You all have a lot to lose.

translation.zh: 你在哪里高就 威尔？

translation.en: I haven't quite figured that out yet.
Yes, why bother? What's the hurry?
translation.zh: 是啊 何必烦恼 急什么？

translation.en: Right. Why do today what you can do in a century?
translation.zh: 今日事今日毕 等一个世纪太久

translation.en: I know one thing we can do.
Do you really come from time?
Reminds me of people who come from the ghetto.
Oh, no? The clock is good for no one.
The poor die and the rich don't live.
translation.zh: 穷人活不下去 有钱人没法享受生活

translation.en: We can all live forever as long as we don't do anything foolish.
translation.zh: 我们别做蠢事就能永生不死

translation.en: Doesn't that scare you? That maybe you'll never do anything foolish?
translation.zh: 你不觉得可怕？ 永远不做蠢事不恐怖吗？

translation.en: Or courageous or anything worth a damn?
translation.zh: 没有勇气 什么也不敢

translation.en: He's only an hour ahead of us.
I've never seen anything like it.
translation.zh: 我从没见过这么美的景色

translation.en: You have this in your backyard. You never go in.
translation.zh: 后院就有海 你从不下水

translation.en: Well? What are you waiting for?
What happened to doing something foolish?

translation.zh: 你在屋外 保镳不在

translation.en: Have you seen my daughter? I have.
It's all right, everyone. What's this about?
translation.zh: 没事 各位 这是做什么？

translation.en: I'm sorry to have to break up the party, Mr. Weis.
translation.zh: 抱歉不请自来 魏斯先生

translation.en: I just need a word with your friend.

translation.zh: 我是时间警察雷蒙里昂

translation.en: What are you doing in this Zone?
It's not illegal, is it? To change Time Zones?
translation.zh: 搬到另一个时区不违法吧？

translation.en: A man named Henry Hamilton gave me over a century.
translation.zh: 亨利汉弥顿给我一百多年

translation.en: He said he didn't need it anymore.
Henry Hamilton was worth thousands of years.
translation.zh: 汉弥顿本来有几千年的寿命

translation.en: You expect me to believe that he was immortal and he wanted to die?
translation.zh: 你要我相信他本可永生却想寻死？

translation.en: I don't expect you to believe it.
But, hey, if you guys are looking for stolen time,
translation.zh: 如果要查办谁偷了时间

translation.en: maybe you should arrest everyone here.
translation.zh: 你应该逮捕现场每个人

translation.en: I only concern myself with what I can measure.

translation.zh: 例如分 秒 时 日

translation.en: And that time is in the wrong hands.
translation.zh: 那些时间不该在你手上

translation.en: That time will be held, along with you.
translation.zh: 我们必须扣留那些时间 扣留你

translation.en: We'll leave you two hours for booking and processing.
translation.zh: 我们会留两小时完成逮捕手续

translation.en: Why are you investigating a suicide?
There's mass murder in the ghetto every day.
translation.zh: 却不管每天都出人命的贫民窟

translation.en: I heard another man talk like that.
You were probably too young to remember your father.
translation.zh: 你可能太小 不记得你父亲了

translation.en: This is New Greenwich, after all.
translation.zh: 这里毕竟是新格林威治

translation.en: Sylvia? Do as I say and go with the guards.
translation.zh: 席薇亚 听话跟保镳走

translation.en: Oh, for God's sake, Father. There's an army in this house.
translation.zh: 拜托 家里都有一支军队了

translation.en: If we can't stop one man from killing us, we should kill ourselves.
translation.zh: 如果他们连一个人都对付不了 我们不如死了算了

translation.en: Move! Get out of the way!
Put it down or I'll blow her head off.
translation.zh: 放下来 否则我轰掉她脑袋

translation.en: You're going to kill us! Please just let me out!
translation.zh: 你会害死我们 拜托让我下车

translation.en: Do you even know how to drive?
I guess you really are from the ghetto, after all.
What the hell do you know about where I'm from? Give me some time.
translation.zh: 你知道什么？给我一点时间

translation.en: Or you're gonna kill me, like you killed Henry Hamilton?
translation.zh: 否则你就做掉我像做掉汉弥顿一样是吗？

translation.en: I'm not giving you a second.
I should have listened to my father.

translation.zh: 求求你送我回家 拜托
放你走 我就没命了

translation.en: Anybody sees it, you're definitely dead.
translation.zh: 被人看到 你就死定了

translation.en: Now that worked too well. You guys wasted a gorgeous car.
translation.zh: 你们做过头了 白糟蹋一部好车

translation.en: He'll wake up dead. That'll be a shock.
translation.zh: 醒来就快没命一定会吓死他

translation.en: Too bad. I would have preferred to kill him more beautifully.
translation.zh: 可惜 能亲自了结他就更棒了

translation.en: The man he stole from me had more than a century.
translation.zh: 他带走的男人有一百多年呢

translation.en: It's like an angel fell from the sky.
translation.zh: 真是天上掉下来的礼物

translation.en: Yeah, we're not alive for long, either.
Where did my time go? I have a half hour!
translation.zh: 我的时间呢？我只剩半小时

translation.en: Minutemen. Does everyone in the ghetto steal?

translation.zh: 这话从你嘴里出来还真可笑

translation.en: Please help me, Will. Let me guess, now you like the idea of sharing.
translation.zh: -帮帮忙-这下你又觉得该互助了

translation.en: Hey, don't worry. It's not the first time I've been this broke.
translation.zh: 我也不是第一次这么穷

translation.en: Well, it's a first for me.
What are we going to do?
Whatever we have to. Come on, we got to go.
translation.zh: 该怎么办就怎么办 快走吧

translation.en: Dispatch, wire me my per diem.
translation.zh: 勤务中心 把每日配额转过来
长官 你又到最后一刻才领

translation.en: Judging by the lack of dead bodies, I have to assume they are also.
translation.zh: 既然没有尸体 他们显然也活着

translation.en: They got jacked. They couldn't have left here with more than minutes.
translation.zh: 他们碰上抢匪 应该没剩几分钟

translation.en: He's back in his old neighborhood.
So, where do you want us to start looking?
We don't. He'll come to us.
translation.zh: 不急 他会自己送上门
波洛 开门 我是威尔

translation.en: He drank himself to death with nine years on his clock.
translation.zh: 他喝到送命 死时还剩九年

translation.en: Will, we have minutes. Try not to act like it.
What is that supposed to mean? Shut up!
We're going to die, Will! Do you want to die?
I hope those are real. Run.
translation.zh: 希望这耳环是真的 快跑

translation.en: MAN: Come back in an hour.
I'll give you two days for them.
You can take the 48 hours, or you can be a pretty corpse.
translation.zh: 要就收 不然就戴着等死

translation.en: I guess I got my wish.

translation.zh: 的确做了蠢事 （魏斯时间借贷公司）

translation.en: Your name's on a lot of buildings.
How much is he worth, anyway?
What do you think he'd pay to get you back?
translation.zh: 他愿意拿多少钱赎回女儿？

translation.en: You have no shame, do you?
COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one minute.
Hello. Mr. Weis, please give the phone to the Timekeeper.
translation.zh: -喂-魏斯先生 请找时间警察

translation.en: Hello, Will. How much do you want?
translation.zh: 威尔 你要多少时间？

translation.en: You'll never live to spend it.
Then distribute it to the Time Lines in Dayton.
translation.zh: （布施所） 那就把时间转给达顿布施所

translation.en: Do it by sunrise tomorrow and she can go home.
translation.zh: 清晨前转汇 她就能回家
我很替你担心 威尔

translation.en: You keep talking like him, you're going to die like him.
translation.zh: 再这样下去 你会步上他的后尘

translation.en: My father died in a fight, trying to take a man's time.
translation.zh: 我爸和人比腕力赌时间时送命

translation.en: Oh, no. His crime wasn't taking time.
translation.zh: 不是 他的罪过不是赌时间

translation.en: He was doing something far more dangerous.
Please don't make your father's mistake.
A thousand years to the Time Lines.

translation.zh: 给女儿这一点儿没什么

translation.en: This is insane. They can take your time, just like that.
translation.zh: 太扯了 人们随时可以抢你的时间

translation.en: We should be safe here until dawn.
translation.zh: 凌晨之前 这里都很安全

translation.en: I pay by the day. It'll take them a while to find me.
translation.zh: 房租一天一结 他们不会立刻找来

translation.en: There's water. It's cold, but it's something.
translation.zh: 这里有水 冷水总比没有好

translation.en: You can put on fresh clothes.
He died when I was a boy.
translation.zh: 他在我小时候就过世了

translation.en: He was a fighter. Strong arm.
translation.zh: 他和人比腕力 臂力很强

translation.en: He wasn't the strongest, but he knew how to win.
translation.zh: 虽然有人比他强 但是他有绝招

translation.en: What you do is let them have the upper hand.
translation.zh: 他的作法就是先让对方占上风

translation.en: Then, he'd let his time go all the way down.
translation.zh: 然后放任自己的时间分秒消失

translation.en: that when you were down to your last seconds

translation.zh: 他们就盯着你的时间看

translation.en: and forget to watch their own.
translation.zh: 忘记看他们自己的时间

translation.en: I think he was killed for giving away what he won.
translation.zh: 他没命应该是因为分送赢来的时间

translation.en: He wasn't just giving them time.
How long have you been this old?
What was it like when your clock started?
translation.zh: 倒计时启动时是什么感觉？

translation.en: My year was gone in a week, we were so in debt.
translation.zh: 一周就用完附送的一年 我们很穷

translation.en: After that, I lived day to day.
translation.zh: 此后每天醒来都只剩一天

translation.en: That's what you're gonna look like for the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 这辈子就是这个模样了

translation.en: My dad gave me a decade to celebrate.
It's nobody's fault, what they're born with.
Let's see how generous your father is now.
The Timekeepers would have never let him do it.
translation.zh: 一定是时间警察阻止他

translation.en: You don't have to say that.
How do you think my father built all those buildings?
translation.zh: 否则他怎么盖得了这么多大楼？

translation.en: By giving away a thousand years?
translation.zh: 难道是因为他乐善好施？

translation.en: There's people on the streets. I can move without being spotted.
translation.zh: 大家都出来了 我可以躲在人群中

translation.en: How does anyone live like this?
I'll watch from here, I'll make sure you're safe.
translation.zh: 我盯着 保护你的安全

translation.en: You know, you could fight this.
I can say that running to the ghetto was my idea.
translation.zh: 我就说跑到贫民区是我的主意

translation.en: My father'd believe that, he thinks I'm reckless.
translation.zh: 我爸会信 他会觉得我很任性

translation.en: He has a lot of influence, Will. He can get you a lawyer.
translation.zh: 他有头有脸 可以帮你请律师

translation.en: He can make a deal with those Timekeepers.
translation.zh: 帮你和时间警察谈条件

translation.en: I'm pretty sure that Timekeeper doesn't make deals.
translation.zh: 我相信那个时间警察不谈条件

translation.en: What are you going to do?
Is it stealing if it's already stolen?
translation.zh: 拿回自己的东西算偷吗？

translation.en: COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one minute.
You couldn't spare a second, Father?
I wish I could say I'm surprised.
Did you hear what I just said? You know I'd do anything for you.
Sorry to disappoint you, we don't keep much on us.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们手上没多少时间
免得便宜你们这种小贼

translation.en: Think of this as a gift.
I didn't mean to shoot him. I wanted to scare him.
translation.zh: 我是无心的 只想吓吓他

translation.en: Thank you. What have you got?
translation.zh: 谢谢 你还有多少时间？

translation.en: Why did you give him time? You should have taken it.
translation.zh: 你给他时间做什么？应该抢他才对
时间警察的时间不超过一天

translation.en: It'll be hours before the others show up.
translation.zh: 同事要好几小时才会到

translation.en: He could die in the ghetto. He still might.
translation.zh: 他会死在那里 就算现在也不安全
时间警察 急什么啊？ 坐一会儿嘛 你可能会喜欢上我们

translation.en: Stay a while. You might like us if you got to know us!
translation.zh: 坐一会儿嘛 你可能会喜欢上我们

translation.en: They're going to think you're with me. Yes.
You've been shot. I was worried you timed out.
translation.zh: 你中枪啊 我担心你用光时间了

translation.en: What are we going to do?
We can't keep driving around in this car. It's a cop car.
translation.zh: 不能开着这部警车到处晃
是开太慢 错就错在不该停车

translation.en: The mistake you made was stopping.
Now, let's see who you got back there.
Got to be a year or two nobody's using.
translation.zh: 应该可以搞到一 两年

translation.en: I was just trying to help.
Now, I'd say, "Your money or your life," but since your money is your life...
translation.zh: 本来应该说要钱还是要命 可是钱就是你的命

translation.en: How dare you steal from me?
Don't think of it as stealing. No?
I'll leave you with what I've had most every day of my life.
translation.zh: 让你尝尝我平常过的日子

translation.en: You can do a lot in a day.
I owe you these. You shouldn't have.
FEMALE ANCHOR: Will Salas, prime suspect in the murder of Henry Hamilton,
translation.zh: 威尔萨拉斯涉嫌杀害亨利汉弥顿

translation.en: is believed to be traveling with Sylvia Weis, daughter of finance magnate, Philippe Weis.
translation.zh: 挟持金融巨子魏斯之女席薇亚

translation.en: Citizens are advised to exercise extreme... (TURNS OFF TV)
You've forgotten I shot a cop.
I can say I made you do all of it.
Do I really want to spend my whole life trying not to die by mistake?
translation.zh: 继续过醉生梦死的日子？

translation.en: A lot of people would say being here is a mistake.
I'm starting to think that I don't, either.
I want to reassure you all there is no cause for alarm.
translation.zh: 我向各位保证不必惊慌

translation.en: MAN: Your Zone is at risk, Philippe.
translation.zh: 你那区有危险 菲利浦

translation.en: WOMAN: It puts us at risk. It can spread.
translation.zh: 这种事情传开来会连累我们

translation.en: Too much time in the wrong hands can crash the market.
translation.zh: 穷人拿了时间会害市场崩盘

translation.en: This hostage situation will be quickly resolved.
Everything is under control. We'll talk soon.
translation.zh: 一切都在控制中 先这样吧
时间警察 你才刚受伤

translation.en: it's really not necessary for you to come in person.
translation.zh: 实在没必要亲自跑一趟

translation.en: I'm afraid it really is necessary.
When can we hope for a rescue?
translation.zh: 请问何时可以救出小女？

translation.en: I believe that's the point. She doesn't appear to want to be rescued.
translation.zh: 问题就在这里 她似乎不想被救

translation.en: Raymond. May I call you Raymond?
translation.zh: 雷蒙 可以叫你雷蒙吗？

translation.en: I invited the man into my home.
He had so much time, how was I supposed to know?
translation.zh: 毕竟他有大把时间 我哪知道呢？

translation.en: Of course, Sylvia brought this on herself by her lack of vigilance.
translation.zh: 当然也怪席薇亚太缺乏警觉性

translation.en: That's why I always tried to keep her close.
translation.zh: 所以我总把她带在身边

translation.en: But she is clearly under Will Salas' control.
translation.zh: 她显然遭到威尔萨拉斯逼迫

translation.en: If it's a matter of resources,
I'm happy to make a contribution.
translation.zh: 我很乐意略尽棉薄之力

translation.en: It's a scandal, what we pay our Timekeepers.
translation.zh: 时间警察的薪水太少了

translation.en: I've issued a warrant for your daughter's arrest.
translation.zh: 我已经下令通缉令千金

translation.en: If she contacts you and you assist her in any way,
translation.zh: 倘若她与你联络或得到你的协助

translation.en: I will issue a warrant for your arrest.
There is nothing I cannot buy.
how many of my years do you want?
even in your lifetime, Mr. Weis. Good night.
translation.zh: 你这辈子别想收买我 晚安了

translation.en: And you don't pull it until you actually want to shoot something.
translation.zh: 真想开枪时才能扣扳机

translation.en: I wanted to shoot something. Right.
Will, if you get a lot of time,
are you really gonna give it away?
I've only ever had a day.
How can you live with yourself watching people die right next to you?
translation.zh: 旁边的人没命 你怎能视而不见？

translation.en: I can help you get all the time you want.
I need to borrow a month. What's the interest?
translation.zh: 我要借一个月 请问利息多少？

translation.en: We can always come to some arrangement.
Ladies and gentlemen, I am happy to announce that Weis Timelenders
translation.zh: 各位先生和女士 很高兴向大家宣布魏斯公司提供无息免偿还贷款

translation.en: is now offering interest-free loans with no payments.
translation.zh: 很高兴向大家宣布魏斯公司提供无息免偿还贷款

translation.en: So help yourselves and take a day.
translation.zh: -不必还-大家尽情来拿一天吧

translation.en: Take a month. Hell, take a year.
translation.zh: 拿一个月 干脆拿一年

translation.en: Come on. Help yourselves! Take it. Take the time. It's free.
translation.zh: -自己来-来拿啊 免费大放送

translation.en: No one's watching their clocks, huh?
Get out of here, or I'll confiscate every second!
translation.zh: 快走 否则我没收每一秒

translation.en: Must've thought it was a drive-through.
Don't move. I don't have much. Everything I have, I give away.
translation.zh: -不准动-我的时间都捐出去了

translation.en: Yes, sir, I do know that, sir.
translation.zh: 是 长官 我知道

translation.en: There are years that shouldn't be there.
translation.zh: 贫民区不该分到那么多时间

translation.en: Doesn't he understand he's hurting the very people he's trying to help?
translation.zh: 他不明白这只是帮倒忙？

translation.en: I finally had time to buy one of these.
Let's not do anything I might regret.
FEMALE ANCHOR: Today, Sylvia Weis withdrew some of her "inheritance"
translation.zh: 今天席薇亚魏斯又取出了部分家产

translation.en: when she and Will Salas robbed her father's time bank
translation.zh: 因为这礼拜她偕同萨拉斯

translation.en: for the sixth time in a week.
Does she want to kill me?

translation.zh: 你那是害她啊 菲利浦

translation.en: Just not as good as that.
You haven't forgotten how to play cards.
Why did I play strip poker with you?
translation.zh: 我干嘛跟你玩脱衣扑克牌？

translation.en: This is where the hours and the days are.
This is where I would hide.

translation.zh: 跳 他们不会跟来 我们只能跳下去了

translation.en: So much for your theory. Shit!
I'm telling you, he'll give up before we do!
Hi. We're looking for a quiet place to stay.
How many rooms? All of them.
We were hoping for something long-term.
Can we rely on the discretion of your staff?
You know who I'm looking for.
I'm looking for whoever gave this man a month!
translation.zh: 我要找出送他一个月的人

translation.en: And I'm gonna clean the clocks off of every one of you in this hellhole
translation.zh: 我要清光你们这些废物的每一秒

translation.en: until someone says something I want to hear.
translation.zh: 除非有人说出我想听的话
不要 慢着 求求你

translation.en: Please don't. Please. I don't know where they are!
I just want a share of the reward.
there's no way they won't kill us, is there?
And every day since I met you.
translation.zh: 我认识你之后就得到新生

translation.en: You forget, I almost got you killed a few times, too.
translation.zh: 你忘了我好几次差点害死你

translation.en: How's the poor little rich girl?
I never got a chance to
properly thank you for your time.
There are a lot more ways to die around here.
translation.zh: 这里的死法比较多样化

translation.en: But here, there's dancing before dying.
Of course, it's your friend I'm most happy to run into again.
translation.zh: 不过我很高兴在这里撞见你朋友

translation.en: You've been causing a lot of trouble, which is normally my job.
translation.zh: 你到处惹麻烦 闹事的人应该是我

translation.en: The reason the Timekeepers leave me alone is 'cause I have boundaries.
translation.zh: 时间警察放过我是因为我有分寸

translation.en: I steal from my own people.
You surely know things are bad when I have to restore order.
translation.zh: 要劳烦我恢复秩序 情况就惨了

translation.en: Fortunately for you, I don't like to kill a man in cold blood.
translation.zh: 你很走运 我不喜欢冷血杀人
不过… 我不喜欢这样

translation.en: I think you deserve a fighting chance.
translation.zh: 我应该给你反击的机会

translation.en: I lose, I die. I win, they kill me.
translation.zh: 输了是一死 赢了也是一死

translation.en: If you don't fight, I'll kill you now.
translation.zh: 你不比 现在就得死

translation.en: Then I'll collect my reward for making everything right in the world.
translation.zh: 恢复社会秩序再去领赏

translation.en: Don't you mean the time he's given away, sir?
translation.zh: 应该说是分送吧 长官？

translation.en: I have given 50 years of my life to this job.
translation.zh: 我为这份工作奉献了50年

translation.en: I am not about to see those years go to waste.
translation.zh: 不能坐视我的心血白费

translation.en: I'm sorry to be the one to break this to you,
translation.zh: 很遗憾由我来宣布坏消息

translation.en: you won't have time to stand around.
translation.zh: 你们就没时间在这里看热闹了

translation.en: We lost. We're not doing any good.
translation.zh: 我们输了 根本没用

translation.en: No. You don't understand. All they have to do is keep raising the cost of living.
translation.zh: 你不懂 他们只要提高生活费就行了

translation.en: A hundred years. Two. A thousand. It does nothing.
translation.zh: 发送一百 二百一千年的时间都没用

translation.en: So, what? We just stop fighting?
We can't win. We can't hurt them.
translation.zh: 我们赢不了 也伤不了他们

translation.en: The time we're taking makes no damn difference!
What would? What would hurt them?
translation.zh: 要怎么改变？怎样才能打击他们？

translation.en: A million years. You got a million years on you?
translation.zh: 抢个一百万年 你有吗？

translation.en: I guess it really would take a million years.
translation.zh: 恐怕真要等上一百万年

translation.en: You've hired more guards since I last saw you.
Thanks to you, I need them.
You'd steal from your own father.
Is it stealing if it's already stolen?
You've started to regret that day, I imagine, Father.
translation.zh: 你恐怕开始后悔生下我了

translation.en: It cost us centuries just to bribe our way in here.
translation.zh: 我们花好几百年才买通关卡进来

translation.en: Let's see what it got us.
There really is a man with a million years.
translation.zh: 原来真有人拥有一百万年

translation.en: That's my first million. It won't be my last.
translation.zh: 那只是我第一个一百万年

translation.en: You know how much good it could do?
translation.zh: 你知道这能造福多少人？

translation.en: I know how much harm it could do.
Try to understand, even if you gave a year to a million people, you're just prolonging their agony.
translation.zh: 一百万人各分到一年也只是苟延残喘

translation.en: Flooding the wrong Zone with a million years, it could cripple the system.
translation.zh: 穷人拿到一百万年会拖垮现有体制

translation.en: We're not meant to live like this.
We're not meant to live forever.
Although I do wonder, Father, if you've ever lived a day in your life.
translation.zh: 但是我怀疑你一天也没好好活过

translation.en: Is that so? You might upset the balance for a generation.
translation.zh: 是吗？你会破坏一代人的秩序

translation.en: But don't fool yourself. In the end, nothing will change.
translation.zh: 但是别自欺欺人 到头来还是一样

translation.en: Because everyone wants to live forever.
translation.zh: 因为大家都想长生不老

translation.en: They all think they have a chance at immortality
translation.zh: 都自认有机会青春不朽

translation.en: even though all the evidence is against it.
They all think they will be the exception.
translation.zh: 人人都以为自己是例外

translation.en: for a few to be immortal, many must die.
translation.zh: 为了少数人能永生 其他人就得死

translation.en: if even one person has to die.
translation.zh: 就算只牺牲一个也不行

translation.en: What was that? What just happened?
It must be a mistake. A million years just went off the clock in New Greenwich.
translation.zh: 一定搞错了新格林威治少了一百万年

translation.en: It's gotta be a mistake, sir. It's not a mistake.
DISPATCHER: There's a lot of traffic in the vicinity, sir.
translation.zh: 车流量很大 找最慢的车

translation.en: All right, look for the slowest car.
You have a million years. You are definitely not in a hurry.
translation.zh: 有一百万年肯定不着急

translation.en: If this works, we gotta get more.
Dayton's not the only zone that can use a few extra years.
And wire me my per diem.
Give the order, shoot on sight.
translation.zh: 传令下去 格杀勿论

translation.en: In New Greenwich? That's against policy, sir.
translation.zh: 在新格林威治杀人？不合法呢

translation.en: So is having a million years leave the Zone.
translation.zh: 从这里偷走一百万年也不合法

translation.en: That time cannot leave the Zone! Shoot on sight!
translation.zh: 不能让那些时间离开 格杀勿论！

translation.en: COMPUTER VOICE: Please deposit one month. Please deposit one month.
Keep going! Keep going! We're close!
Lost a lot of time, Mr. Leon.
translation.zh: 你丢了很多时间呢 里昂先生

translation.en: Looks like you're about out yourself.
We can make it. Can we?
I worked out how to escape.
And now you make sure no one else does.
translation.zh: 现在你却阻止别人翻身

translation.en: That's the way it has to be.

translation.zh: 只能维持时间顺利运转

translation.en: I'm gonna need some of that time you borrowed from me.
Unless you want us to die on the way to our execution.
translation.zh: 否则我们被处决前就会没命

translation.en: One of us can make it. Take mine.
translation.zh: 我们其中一人过去还行 我的时间给你

translation.en: You take mine. You can get there, I can't! I can't get there. You can.
translation.zh: 我给你 你跑得到 我不行

translation.en: What? The Keeper's time. Run. Run!
translation.zh: 拿警察的时间 快跑

translation.en: I need time. COMPUTER VOICE: Time transfer.
Could do a lot in a day.
FEMALE ANCHOR: These are live pictures from Dayton.
Citizens have taken to the streets.
There's so much stolen time in circulation.
And now, citizens are crossing Zones,

translation.zh: 有人正进入新格林威治

translation.en: While authorities claim they have the situation
translation.zh: 尽管警方宣称情况都在掌控中

translation.en: under control, others fear the system may be headed for collapse.
translation.zh: 部份人士却担心体制可能崩盘

translation.en: We will continue to update you on this developing story.
translation.zh: 我们会继续转播最新消息

translation.en: Sir, we lost Zone Eight. And Ten.
MALE ANCHOR: Still no sign of fugitives Will Salas and Sylvia Weis.
translation.zh: 萨拉斯与魏斯依旧下落不明

translation.en: Authorities continue to ask for the public's help
in bringing these criminals to justice.
Told you there were bigger banks.
translation.zh: 我早说过有更大的银行
你现在就可以一展所长
